title: The prophecies of Radiohead's 'Kid A' and 'Amnesiac,' 20 years later
description: Our friends at NPR's Throughline podcast take a deep dive into the Radiohead albums Kid A and Amnesiac, examining the ways the band confronted the monsters around us and within us at the dawn of a new millennium.
